```{r}
library(readxl)
Assists <- read_excel("Assists.xlsx")
```

```{r}
Transpose_assists <- t(Assists)
```

```{r}
# Identify rows that contain non-numeric values
numeric_rows <- apply(Transpose_assists, 1, function(row) all(suppressWarnings(!is.na(as.numeric(row)))))

# Keep only numeric rows
A_numeric <- Transpose_assists[numeric_rows, , drop = FALSE]

# Convert to numeric matrix
A <- matrix(as.numeric(A_numeric), nrow = sum(numeric_rows))
```

```{r}
row_sums <- rowSums(A)
```

```{r}
# Normalize each row by its corresponding sum
s <- A / row_sums
```

```{r}
ones <- matrix(1, nrow = 29, ncol = 1)
one_fourths <- matrix(1/29, nrow = 1, ncol = 29)
v <- ones %*% one_fourths
G_1 <- 0.85 * s + 0.15 * v
```


```{r}
library(fastmatrix)
power <- power.method(t(G_1), only.value = FALSE, maxiter = 100, tol = 1e-10)
```

```{r}
library(ohenery)
pagerank_2 <- normalize(power$vector)
pagerank_2
```
